db:update.doc:name: update users in Database
db:update.db:parameterized-query: UPDATE User SET Id = #[payload.Id], AboutMe = #[payload.AboutMe], Alias = #[payload.Alias], City = #[payload.City], CompanyName = #[payload.CompanyName], Country = #[payload.Country], Department = #[payload.Department], Division = #[payload.Division], Email = #[payload.Email], EmailEncodingKey = #[payload.EmailEncodingKey], Fax = #[payload.Fax], FirstName = #[payload.FirstName], LanguageLocaleKey = #[payload.LanguageLocaleKey], LastModifiedById = CURRENT_USER, LastModifiedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LastName = #[payload.LastName], LocaleSidKey = #[payload.LocaleSidKey], MobilePhone = #[payload.MobilePhone], Phone = #[payload.Phone], PostalCode = #[payload.PostalCode], State = #[payload.State], Street = #[payload.Street], TimeZoneSidKey = #[payload.TimeZoneSidKey], Title = #[payload.Title], Username = #[payload.Username], ProfileId = #[payload.ProfileId] WHERE Id = #[payload.Id]

sfdc:query-single.query: SELECT Id, Email, FirstName, LastName, Alias, Title, TimeZoneSidKey, LocaleSidKey, EmailEncodingKey, ProfileId, LanguageLocaleKey, CommunityNickname FROM User WHERE Email = '#[payload.Email]'

db:insert.doc:name: Insert user to Database
db:insert.db:parameterized-query: INSERT INTO User ( Id, Alias, Country, Email, EmailEncodingKey, FirstName, LanguageLocaleKey, LastModifiedById, LastModifiedDate, LastName, LocaleSidKey, TimeZoneSidKey, Username, ProfileId, CommunityNickname ) VALUES ( #[payload.Id], #[payload.Alias], #[payload.Country], #[payload.Email], #[payload.EmailEncodingKey], #[payload.FirstName], #[payload.LanguageLocaleKey], CURRENT_USER, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #[payload.LastName], #[payload.LocaleSidKey], #[payload.TimeZoneSidKey], #[payload.Username], #[payload.ProfileId], #[payload.CommunityNickname] )
